groups.name: authors
groups.membership: SELECT author AS uid, paper AS gid FROM PaperCoauthor WHERE author = ?

policies.predicate: SELECT * FROM Paper JOIN GroupContext ON (Paper.id = GroupContext.id)
policies.description: Authors can see their own papers.

policies.predicate: SELECT * FROM Review JOIN GroupContext ON (Review.paper = GroupContext.id)
policies.description: Authors can see reviews for their own paper.

groups.name: chairs
groups.membership: SELECT username AS uid, level AS gid FROM UserProfile WHERE level = 'chair' AND username = ?

policies.description: Chairs can't see authors identities during submission.

groups.name: reviewers
groups.membership: SELECT username AS uid, paper AS gid FROM ReviewAssignment WHERE username = ?

policies.predicate: SELECT * FROM Paper JOIN GroupContext ON (Paper.id = GroupContext.id)
policies.description: Reviewers can see papers they are assigned to.

policies.predicate: SELECT * FROM Review JOIN GroupContext ON (Review.paper = GroupContext.id)
policies.description: Reviewers can see reviews on papers they are assigned to.
